text: Turkey is a wonderful destination
If you’re dreaming of going to Europe
Here you will find beautiful landscapes
With breathtaking rocky views
And beaches with crystal clear waters
This beautiful country has many invaluable monuments
And relics which remind us of Turkey’s incredible history
Turkish lands witnessed different cultures like Greco-Roman
Ottoman, Ethiopian influences
And even more.
Are you still not sure about traveling to this gorgeous country?
Come with us and discover 10 amazing places
That will make you book the next flight to Turkey!
But before we get started subscribe to out channel
And turn on notifications
So you can keep up to date with all our lates destinations
No.1 Istanbul
This city is known for being an outstanding balance
Between eastern traditions and western modernity.
Walk the narrow old town streets
And find the perfect souvenir in the Grand Bazaar
Or the Egyptian spice market.
Visit the Dolmabahçe Palace
And marvel at its luxurious interior
And beautiful royal gardens
During your stay in this unforgettable city
Take a stroll along the Istiklal Street.
The place is full of stores, cafes And restaurants
Where you will enjoy local specialties, such as Turkish coffee.
And you can also admire the Hagia Sophia!
This was once the main seat of Constantinople
And was the most remarkable architectural achievement
Of the Byzantine empire.
And currently, it runs as a mosque.
But if you want to enjoy a panoramic view of Istanbul
You should visit the Galata tower
It is one of the highest points of the city
And from where you can admire its beauty
Definitely a must when you’re in Istanbul
No.2 Ölüdeniz
Ölüdeniz  village is an incredible touristic spot
For those who are chasing relaxing places in this part of the world.
Lush forests are surrounding the entire place!
And on the coastline
You will find one of the most famous beaches in all of Turkey.
Visit the famous deep blue lagoon
Which is a natural reserve.
You just can't miss the delicious seafood there!
And you can also take to the skies while paragliding
And enjoy the beautiful views
Or tour the Ölüdeniz mountains
And find the ruins of the village of Kayaköy
The natural environment of the village is a favorite destination
For those who love hiking and outdoor activities.
No.3 Aladağlar National Park
People who enjoy outdoor activities such as
Hiking,mountain biking
Or the likes should visit this park
To experience adventure while traveling in Turkey.
The Turkish government declared it a national park in 1995.
This park has everything you need for an unforgettable vacation!
You will find all kinds of wildlife such as
Goats, bears, wolves, birds of prey
But you have nothing to worry about!
There are areas designated for human enjoyment
Without being exposed to dangerous situations.
You can camp among extensive pine forests
Raft the rapids
And explore the park  accompanied by a guide.
If your thing is swimming and enjoying refreshing waterfalls,
Then you should stop by the Kapuzbaşı falls!
Wildlife photography enthusiasts consider this place
A unique place to capture the best moments of nature.
The natural wonders of this park are waiting for you.
No.4 Pamukkale
If you are heading to Denizli province
Don't forget to stop by the beautiful Pamukkale
UNESCO declared this incredible natural phenomenon
Part of the World Heritage Site in 1988.
This place looks like iced waterfalls.
But they are thermal springs that emerge to the surface
By the constant technical movements of the mountain.
And its whitish color is due to the
Accumulation of minerals in these natural pools.
You can walk from the base of the mountain
And go up to the water wells.
Sit for a while and enjoy the healing waters!
Another exciting place to visit is Hierapolis
Also declared by UNESCO as a World Heritage Site.
The ruins of the old theater of Hierapolis
The temples, and the graveyard will amaze you!
We recommend you book a guided tour
To visit all the places of interest much more easily.
No.5 Izmir
People say
That Izmir is one of the most beautiful cities in all of Turkey.
Here you can find places like the famous Kemeralti  Market.
The market combines the classic bustle of vendors
With beautiful jewelry, handicrafts, clothes
And souvenirs that attract travelers .
Who want to take a piece of Izmir with them
Admire the  Hisar Mosque during your visit
One of the largest in Izmir.
Once inside view its beautiful designs and unique colors.
Without a doubt
A historical building worth seeing at least once in your lifetime.
Take a walk through Konak Square
We will find the famous Izmir Clock Tower.
It has four fountains at its base and about 25 meters high
This beautiful tower has a design from the Ottoman culture.
No.6 Ephesus
Thousands of tourists every year visit Ephesus
Because it contains the ruins of various historical monuments
Of ancient times.
Tour the different attractions that Ephesus offers
Such as the Via dei Cureti
One of the city's main roads!
You will find many sites of interest
Such as the Temple of Hadrian, the Hillside Houses, Hadrian's Gate
The Library of Celsus, and many others.
And don't forget to pass by the Ancient Theater
It considered the largest arena in the world.
The architecture mixes Greek and Roman nuances.
And here is  where the Ephesus Festival takes place
A great festival that recalls the old customs of this ancient city.
No.7 Alanya
The city of Alanya is one of the favorite tourist spots
For travelers who love adventure
History, and beaches.
In the summertime, beaches are the center of attention of tourists
And the favorite is the Cleopatra beach.
This beach is famous because
Queen Cleopatra bathed in its waters
During her escapades with Marco Antonio.
In the rocky massif of the city
This imposing castle is one of the most important archaeological
Remains of the town.
The area is open to the public.
Within the facilities
You will find the Seljuk Ehmedek Fortress
And several ancient houses in the citadel.
You must visit the archaeological museum
And learn about the historical findings of the country.
Many of these artifacts date back to more than 500 years B.C!
Another interesting place is the Damlataş caves.
It is the perfect place for travelers seeking adventure
More than 30 meters long
Here you can observe the spectacular formations of stalagmites.
No.8 Antalya
Antalya with two million people has long been an important port
Its narrow streets are labyrinth-like
But it is the best option for
Those looking for delicious food and drink.
Don't forget to stop by Haşim İşcan Cultural Center
And Antalya State Theater
And enjoy the best theatrical and musical performances in town.
The city, in general, has witnessed various cultural arrivals
And every one of them has left their mark there.
That's why  throughout the city
You can find remains of ancient structures
Dating back to the 7th century B.C.
If you want to swim and enjoy the sunlight
You can visit the beach club located in the port.
The place is a beach without sand
So you can rent a beach umbrella
And a stand to relax and enjoy the weather.
No.9 Cappadocia
Located in central Turkey
It’s a place of unique charm and stunning features
There're many caves and subway buildings
Carved into the rock of the mountains that cover the place.
It is a fascinating site to tour and explore
Enjoy the unique experience of observing
This beautiful city from a hot air balloon.
From there
You will recognize the famous fairy chimneys!
These mushroom-shaped rock formations
Stand out on the surface of this Turkish area.
If you want to know more about the history
We recommend visiting the open-air museum of Goreme.
Those who love hiking will feel at home
Walking through the enormous valleys full of rocks
Such as the Ihlara  valley.
You can also visit the caves that are part of beautiful subway cities
Such as Kaymakli or Zelda
No.10 Mount Nemrut
Preserved thanks to its UNESCO World Heritage Site designation
This tourist attraction is spiritually significant.
The attraction of this place is its giant statues representing
Ancient Armenian, Greek, and Persian gods
And animal figures such as lions and eagles.
King Antiochus designated it as a burial mound
A place of eternal rest for ancient kings.
It has remained remarkably well preserved over time.
Many visitors come to learn about the history
Of the place through guided tours.
You'll want to enjoy the beautiful sunsets of the Turkish firmament
And this mountain will give you the best views.
Besides enjoying the incredible tourist attractions
Don't miss the opportunity to taste the local gastronomy.
Its citizens are friendly people
Ready to welcome tourists.
In short, turkey is a complete tourist destination
Which will meet the requirements of the most challenging traveler.
Whether it is for an extended stay or just a short trip
We recommend you discover the tourist potential of Turkey!
If you enjoyed this video
Give it a like and click subscribe
Thanks for watching
